mapper.select: SELECT serv_id AS servId FROM welfare
mapper.update: UPDATE welfare SET serv_name = #{servName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, biz_dept = #{bizDept}, sido = #{sido}, sgg = #{sgg}, serv_summary = #{servSummary}, household = #{household}, like_subject = #{likeSubject}, sup_period = #{supPeriod}, prov_type = #{provType}, app_way = #{appWay}, sup_target = #{supTarget}, sel_standard = #{selStandard}, sal_serv = #{salServ} WHERE serv_id = #{servId}
